summary.para: Called on drag enter to set drag effect, as specified.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

param.name: psiaData
param.para: A pointer to an array containing the items being dragged.

param.name: fOutsideSource
param.para: Specifies whether drag started outside target area.

param.name: grfKeyState
param.para: The current state of keyboard modifier keys.

param.name: pdwEffect
param.para: On success, contains a pointer to the drag effect value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Failing this method blocks the drag operation in the namespace tree control (NSTC).

summary.para: Called on drag leave for a specified item.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called on drag over to set drag effect, as specified.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

param.name: psiaData
param.para: A pointer to an array containing the items being dragged.

param.name: grfKeyState
param.para: The current state of keyboard modifier keys.

param.name: pdwEffect
param.para: On success, contains a pointer to the drag effect value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Failing this method blocks the drag operation in the namespace tree control (NSTC).

summary.para: Called when the item is being dragged within the same level (within the same parent folder) in the tree.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

param.name: psiaData
param.para: A pointer to an array containing the items being dragged.

param.name: iNewPosition
param.para: The index if the item being dragged is between items; otherwise, NSTCDHPOS_ONTOP (-1).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Failing this method prevents the item rearrangement.

summary.para: Called on drop to set drop effect, as specified.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

param.name: psiaData
param.para: A pointer to an array representing a data object.

param.name: grfKeyState
param.para: The current state of keyboard modifier keys.

param.name: pdwEffect
param.para: A pointer to the drop effect value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note To overwrite the default drop behavior, a client should fail this method; success proceeds with the default drop operation.

summary.para: Called when the item is being dropped within the same level (within the same parent folder) in the tree.

param.name: psiOver
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing the item underneath the mouse cursor. Optional.

param.name: psiaData
param.para: A pointer to an array representing a data object.

param.name: iNewPosition
param.para: The index if the item being dropped is between items; otherwise, NSTCDHPOS_ONTOP (-1).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Failing this method prevents the item rearrangement from happening.

summary.para: Exposes handler methods for drag-and-drop. Used by the namespace tree control to notify the client of any drag-and-drop operation happening within the control. Provides a way for a client to intercept a drop operation and perform its own action, or to return the desired drop effect.
